name: The Future | An FSX Movie
description:
The future is bright for aviation. New aircraft, new technologies, new levels of comfort for passengers.
With that, however, we must say goodbye to some old friends who served us well.

After a month of painstaking editing and perfecting, finally - here's my entry for FSXAviation1 and 1506jet's video contest. I tried really hard to make this my best FSX movie yet, so I hope you guys enjoy! 

UPDATE: It won second place ;)

Please note that my newer FSX movies are much better, IMO.

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
_____________________________________________________

Addons used:
PMDG 777 / MD-11
Captain Sim 727
Majestic Dash 8 Q400
CamSim CS300 / A350-900
SkySpirit 777-9X / 747-8i
QualityWings 757
Ready for Pushback 747-200F
AeroSim 787
Project Airbus A380
ORBX Northern Rockies Package
_____________________________________________________

Check out my previous video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1LG-Qu7dtAQ
(Learjet 35 takeoff)
_____________________________________________________

Music is "Heroic Age" and "Stages of Grief" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
